casebody.data:
Jonathan E. BRUNSON
v.
The OFFICE OF the GOVERNOR OF NORTH CAROLINA, et al. No. 154P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 21, 2019 Jonathan E. Brunson, for Brunson, Jonathan E. Jessica B. Helms, Associate Attorney General, for The Office of the Governor of North Carolina. Barry H. Bloch, Assistant Attorney General, for The Office of the Governor of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 29th of April 2019 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
